name: Trail Of Pigs
description:
TRAIL OF PIGS.

In a post apolyptic world where everyone is against each other, two pigs try to survive. May the most ruthless survive.

-----------------------------------------------

INSTRUCTIONS:

  • Move with WASD or the ARROW KEYS.
  • Hide with CONTROL. (Do this next to bushes for extra stealth)
  • Shoot with LEFT CLICK. (You need bullets and they make lots of noise, be careful)
  • Run with SHIFT. (You are wounded, running will slowly drain your health)
  • Use the buttons with RIGHT CLICK. Heal with RIGHT CLICK next to your name.

Don't let you or your friend succumb to wounds or hunger, or you will die. Stop anytime to HUNT for supplies.

They'll usually try to check out the place where they heard the shot coming from.

Avoiding fights is always better.

-----------------------------------------------

Made for the Ludum Dare 48! First Ludum Dare ever, and i'm hyped. I think this is my best game yet, it's the most entertaining to me, that's for sure.  It's really hard, but i hope some of you can rise up to the challenge.

Game by Stopsignal

Music by Juanba
